title: Shadow card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a pair of twins. One is dressed in royal finery while the other is in grey rags, with both of their hands entwined around the handle of a simple knife.}} The Shadow card makes the player [[invisible]] with duration up to (power / 4) + 14. At power level 1 or 2, it additionally gives 1d(power/4) turns of bonus stealth. ==History== This card was removed in [[0.19]].
